content:
System.Deployment.Internal.CodeSigning Namespace

Definition

The System.Deployment.Internal.CodeSigning namespace contains classes for processing digital signatures.

In this Article

Classes

RSAPKCS1SHA256SignatureDescription

Creates RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter and RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter objects.
